page.title: 16HORTICULTURE IN RODNEY STOKE
page.content: A good deal of equipment and machinery is used on Brangay farm near Rodney Stoke .Two tractors are used ,a strawberry planter, a lettuce planter, rotavators ,sprayers,fertilizer spreaders,harrows,sub - soilers and irrigation equipment.On the farm there is a cold store and packing sheds and 2 vans are used ,one with a refrigeration unit for direct sales to supermarkets.Strawberries are marketed through the Cheddar valley co-operative to supermarkets but wholesale markets in Bristol,Cardiff and Birmingham are also supplied. Production and demand are very closely monitored and the farm uses Prestel computer facilities to check daily price and demand every morning.Climate conditions are carefully checked and the farm experiences about 800 millimetres of rain per year.
